reviews.text: What a fun place to go with a family that is really hungry and ready for some entertainment. This dining experience was entertaining from the start. Immediately as you get to the restaurant outside you have beautiful Japanese garden with some gorgeous prize-winning goldfishes. They kids had so much fun looking at them swimming and everything.  After all of that excitement we were able to be seated at a Japanese Hibachi Table with another family and kids so my children had a lot of fun interacting with everyone else around the table. As the chef came in he quickly started his show and it was fun interactive and very energetic. There was so much food!!!! Your portions are very large so make sure you come hungry. the typical Hibachi chicken dinner included rice vegetables and before that you get to have soup and salad. The only reason I took a star of was that the food was not as flavorful or authentic as I am used to but for being Japanese attraction chain spot it was sort of expected to be a little Bland however it was perfect for kiddos taste buds.

The food is surprisingly better than one might think. The salad that comes out with the soup prior to the meal is delicious I really like the dressing here. I did not care for the sushi as it did not seem as fresh as some places. The steak and chicken combo I ordered was well-cooked and affordable.

We arrived around 5:30, no one else in the dining area except for a group that was finishing up. We waited 15-20min before getting our drinks. A party of 16 arrived after we got our drinks. We had already ordered when another group joined our table. We still had not received our salads or soup an HOUR after being seated, but the party’s food was being cooked and served. Poor management. We were told that the party arrived before us, when they actually MOVED us from the table the party was sitting at to serve us quicker. The manager that I spoke with said “they knew what they wanted to eat, they had a list” I DON’T CARE if they had a list, we had ordered our food BEFORE the party placed their order. Waiting an hour and not receiving soups and salads is unacceptable in my book.

This place has always been pretty good. However the service has really gone down hill. No refills for the entire meal. Wrong food served. Appetizers brought after meal. Very small portions. Time to search for new place to eat.

Yes yes!! Best sushi presentation in Tennessee. Chef Boy knows how to make a birthday special. I told him to surprise me and yes I was surprised with a great sushi dinner.. will always be my go to place for sushi!!

Good cakes and coffee and decent selection of Western foods including sandwiches, salads and pasta. Bit pricey (neatly 30 yuan for a slice of cake) but nice interior and seating. English menus, not much spoken
We dropped in for coffee at this cosy European themed café.  The coffee was excellent but we thought that it was a little expensive.
A classic in Kunming. They've been around for as long as I can remember and have a good variety of Western food options, starting with breakfast and ending with evening snacks.
Good Place to be! Taste of the Curry Dishes is great!!!!
Typical Kunming fusion cafe. Second floor by the window, can smoke and enjoy people-watching

The pineapple salsa was good, and I always love fried plantains... but everything else was okay at best. The mole lacked depth. The chips are like the cheap, hard kind you get at a grocery store. They’re definitely not made in house. Also $14 for 3 salsas and some chips is outrageous. I’d pass on it, if you’re looking for something spectacular.

Not your typical Mexican place! From the daily salsa list (try the strawberry salsa if you see it!) to lots of beautiful and flavorful specials, you'll find something to please your palate. If you have any questions about the dishes, the staff is quite willing to explain the menu and help you find the perfect plate. Oh, and the margaritas are top notch! It's a small place so we've found it best to go just after lunch. Note: They close at 4pm and reopen at 5pm.
Food is wonderful and well priced. The restaurant is quite small and gets full quickly, but  it is worth the wait. Service is rapid and overall, the restaurant is a great experience.

This place is amazing, they serve real delicious Mexican/Caribbean food. The waitresses and the cooks were on it, they were super nice and friendly. The wait was just a few mins. We enjoyed the food and will definitely recommend to anybody.

There was a little bit of a wait for 15 people but they did the best to accommodate us tonight. One of the best Mexican restaurants we have had and definitely worth the wait!! Thank you for the excellent service and food!!!
